description: This file defines a React component for the driver dashboard page in a ride-sharing application. It manages driver profiles, their availability status, and displays a list of drivers with options to create/update profiles and toggle their active status.

methods.name: DriverDashboardPage
methods.description: Main React component that renders the driver dashboard, handles form state, API calls for fetching drivers, saving profiles, and toggling availability.

methods.name: fetchDrivers
methods.description: Fetches the list of drivers from the backend API.

methods.name: onSaveProfile
methods.description: Handles the form submission to create or update a driver profile.

methods.name: toggleAvailability
methods.description: Toggles the availability status of a driver by calling the backend API.
